attributes.action: reverse the controversial reduction in training for Territorial Army units, and to reinstate the full Territorial Army budget.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need the PM to personally  intervene, and say, this is wrong.  The TA not only a part of the military, but is a import income for many.  There is the possibility of losing many solders over this.  The TA is not a tap which can be turned on and off...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
